title: Get Hour from TIME_OF_DAY
description: This function calculates the hour from a given input of type TIME_OF_DAY by converting it to DWORD format and then deriving the hour value in INT format.
name: HOUR

input.name: itod
input.description: The input variable representing the time of day from which the hour will be extracted.

return_value.description: The hour value extracted from the input TIME_OF_DAY, represented as an integer.
